#include<iostream>

using namespace std;
#define MOD 10000
#define MAXSIZE 111111
int main()
{
	std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	long long n;
	long long re;
	int T;
	scanf("%d",&T);
	while(T--)
	{
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		re=n*(n-1)/2-1;
		if(n%2==0)
			re+=n/2;
		else
			re+=n/2;
		if(n==1)
			re=0;
		printf("%lld\n",re);
	}
	//system("pause");
	return 0;
}
